data.name: TowerClimb - Extended Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Full TowerClimb Soundtrack, played at the in-game speed, in .ogg format, with Bonus Tracks.

Don't read the track list if you don't want spoilers!












Track List:

Game Tracks
---------------------------------------
1. Arcade 1 - Man in Machine.ogg
2. Arcade 2 - Switchy Squares.ogg
3. Arcade 3 - Risky Bitsness.ogg
4. Arcade Hall.ogg
5. Ascension.ogg
6. Bedtime House.ogg
7. Beetle Filled.ogg
8. Brutal Tension.ogg
9. Centurial Trials Room 101.ogg
10. Chapter 1 - Ending.ogg
11. Chapter 1 - Title Theme.ogg
12. Chapter 2 - Title Theme.ogg
13. Chapter 2 Equipment Room.ogg
14. Club Z - Flex Flash.ogg
15. Club Z - Outside (close).ogg
16. Club Z - Outside (far).ogg
17. Club Z - Strobe Fluctuation.ogg
18. Colosseum - Brobash, Strongest Man.ogg
19. Colosseum - Main Theme.ogg
20. Conservatory.ogg
21. Credit Climb.ogg
22. Dream Stadium Theme.ogg
23. Fatal Flight.ogg
24. Fire Pressure.ogg
25. Giant Worm.ogg
26. Hatchery.ogg
27. Heart of the Tower (excruciating heat).ogg
28. Heart of the Tower.ogg
29. Intro Theme.ogg
30. Krystelle Appears.ogg
31. True Final Battle Theme.ogg
32. Krystelle's Test.ogg
33. Krystelle's Throne.ogg
34. Lava Rising!.ogg
35. Man has fallen (death theme).ogg
36. Purple Lava Trap.ogg
37. Room with the Statue.ogg
38. Ruins - Frozen Ascent.ogg
39. Secret Zone.ogg
40. Segmentation Plant - Cubes of Iron.ogg
41. Segmentation Plant - Segmented Sewer.ogg
42. Segmentation Plant - Trials.ogg
43. Soul Crossing.ogg
44. Temple of Devotion.ogg
45. Tower Ambience.ogg
46. Tutorial - Initial Knowledge.ogg
47. Unlikely Outcrop.ogg
48. Volt Cave - Decomposed Transistor.ogg
49. Volt Cave - Unforgiven Evolution.ogg
50. Volt Cave Entrance.ogg
51. Witch Theme.ogg
52. Yet Another Man.ogg
53. Final Battle 1 - Legendary Wizard.ogg
54. Final Battle 2- Muscle Time.ogg
55. Final Battle 3 - Heavy Handed.ogg
56. Final Battle 4 - Tense Momentum.ogg
57. Zardo wants to steal!.ogg
58. Zardo's Gallery.ogg
59. ZardoLand - Cannon Crossway.ogg
60. ZardoLand - Dangerous Fun.ogg
61. ZardoLand - Entrance.ogg
62. ZardoLand - Fearless.ogg
63. ZardoLand - Sign Theme.ogg
64. Zball - Casual.ogg
65. Zball - Mid Game.ogg
66. Zball - Overdrive Heat.ogg
67. Zball - Show ur Skillz.ogg
68. Zball - Turbo Time.ogg
69. Zenith - Road to Space.ogg
70. Enter the light (Player select with 6+ players)

BONUS TRACKS
-----------------------------------------
71. Arcade - Track 4.ogg
72. Club Z - Megamix.ogg
73. Club Z - Old Wave.ogg
74. Dream Match.ogg
75. MistCity.ogg
76. No Turning Back.ogg
77. Old Ruins Music.ogg
78. Shards of Hope.ogg
79. Will through the Rain.ogg
80. Worn Palms.ogg
81. ZardoLand - Track 5.ogg
82. Volt Cave entrance (Extended)
83. Ascend (trailer music)
